title: Evolution of Programmers' Trust in Generative AI Programming Assistants
summary: This study aims to understand programmers' evolution of trust in generative AI programming assistants, as trust is a dynamic attitude that may change over time and impacts how programmers use these tools.
usefulness_reason: The paper focuses on programmers' trust in AI assistants and does not directly address Spatio Temporal Point Process, Spatio Temporal, Point Process, Contextual dataset, or Survey data in a substantial way. While it might involve data collection, it's not the primary focus of the search query.
